data.text:
The deadline for the submission of these documents 
'miraculously' overlapped, but somehow I managed 
to finish them. During a break――
data.processed:
󠁿The deadline for the submission of these documents 
󠁿'miraculously' overlapped, but somehow I managed 
󠁿to finish them. During a break――

data.text:
I'm coming in! ……Trainer-san, you alive~? 
I brought you something!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I'm coming in! ……Trainer-san, you alive~? 
󠁿I brought you something!

data.text:
Ahhh~, you look exhausted again. You probably haven't even eat 
yet, huh? I guess coming here was the right call.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Ahhh~, you look exhausted again. You probably haven't even eat 
󠁿yet, huh? I guess coming here was the right call.

data.text:
Go on, eat this. I washed it already and it's still cold! 
You could eat it right now.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Go on, eat this. I washed it already and it's still cold! 
󠁿You could eat it right now.

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace's thoughfulness almost brought a tear to my eye. 
I received the tomato from her and took a hearty bite.
data.processed:
󠁿Katsuragi Ace's thoughfulness almost brought a tear to my eye. 
󠁿I received the tomato from her and took a hearty bite.

data.text:
Hahaa! Right~? After all, I'm a farmer's girl! 
These are Katsuragi Ace-sama's homegrown vegetables, you see!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Hahaa! Right~? After all, I'm a farmer's girl! 
󠁿These are Katsuragi Ace-sama's homegrown vegetables, you see!

data.text:
I got it from the field I borrowed from the academy, 
so it's a freshly picked tomato! ……If you're interested, 
want to take a look on your break?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I got it from the field I borrowed from the academy, 
󠁿so it's a freshly picked tomato! ……If you're interested, 
󠁿want to take a look on your break?

data.text:
Before Katsuragi Ace's training, I went to look at her field. 
It seemed exceptionally well-maintained, so I asked――

choices.text: Why are you borrowing this field?
Why are you borrowing this field?

data.processed:
󠁿Before Katsuragi Ace's training, I went to look at her field. 
󠁿It seemed exceptionally well-maintained, so I asked――

data.text:
Ah, well, since I was young, I've been helping out 
with the fields at home! If I don't do a little field 
work in the mornings, it just doesn't feel right.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, well, since I was young, I've been helping out 
󠁿with the fields at home! If I don't do a little field 
󠁿work in the mornings, it just doesn't feel right.

data.text:
……And so, I asked the Chairman and then set 
this up! My family had a laugh when they told 
me 『Even though you went to the city?!』.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿……And so, I asked the Chairman and then set 
󠁿this up! My family had a laugh when they told 
󠁿me 『Even though you went to the city?!』.

data.text:
Yep! Yesterday, they sent me a picture of when we were all 
working the fields saying 『A nostalgic picture!』
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Yep! Yesterday, they sent me a picture of when we were all 
󠁿working the fields saying 『A nostalgic picture!』

data.text:
――It was still dark in the morning, so we'd 
all head to the field in a line. And if anyone 
yawned, then everyone would end up doing it too.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿――It was still dark in the morning, so we'd 
󠁿all head to the field in a line. And if anyone 
󠁿yawned, then everyone would end up doing it too.

data.text:
『So you've appeared, Yawning Bandit!』  we'd say, 
and it'd turn in to a game of tag! In the end, 
Mom would end up carrying Dad along……how nostalgic.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿『So you've appeared, Yawning Bandit!』  we'd say, 
󠁿and it'd turn in to a game of tag! In the end, 
󠁿Mom would end up carrying Dad along……how nostalgic.

data.text:
I wonder if everyone's doing alright~. At this point, 
I could probably carry my dad too, don't you think?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I wonder if everyone's doing alright~. At this point, 
󠁿I could probably carry my dad too, don't you think?

data.text:
……Katsuragi Ace was probably feeling a little lonely. 
Even though she was talking about something pleasant, 
her tail was just swaying in the wind.
data.processed:
󠁿……Katsuragi Ace was probably feeling a little lonely. 
󠁿Even though she was talking about something pleasant, 
󠁿her tail was just swaying in the wind.

data.text:
She was usually composed, but she was still a student. 
I needed to keep it together and follow up here――

choices.text: I want to try working the field too!
I want to try working the field too!

data.processed:
󠁿She was usually composed, but she was still a student. 
󠁿I needed to keep it together and follow up here――

data.text:
Eh? Work the field……? 
What're you saying all of a sudden?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? Work the field……? 
󠁿What're you saying all of a sudden?

data.text:
……though half of it was just out of expedience. 
The real goal was to help console her.
data.processed:
󠁿……though half of it was just out of expedience. 
󠁿The real goal was to help console her.

data.text:
While I couldn't become a replacement for her family, 
I could at least make sure she wasn't alone.
data.processed:
󠁿While I couldn't become a replacement for her family, 
󠁿I could at least make sure she wasn't alone.

data.text:
Hehee, is that so!? 
……Alright! Then, can you help me with the harvesting?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Hehee, is that so!? 
󠁿……Alright! Then, can you help me with the harvesting?

data.text:
And while we're at it, you can take some too! 
There's alot after all! ……I'll go get some scissors!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿And while we're at it, you can take some too! 
󠁿There's alot after all! ……I'll go get some scissors!

data.text:
I nodded in response. Now I could just enjoy the harvest, 
so I squatted down in the tomato field――At that moment――
data.processed:
󠁿I nodded in response. Now I could just enjoy the harvest, 
󠁿so I squatted down in the tomato field――At that moment――

data.text:
Trainer-san!? 
Are you okay!? Is there a snake!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san!? 
󠁿Are you okay!? Is there a snake!?

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: 󠁿Huh?

data.text:
I had fallen on my butt and was pointing. 
The caterpillar was on the stem of a tomato.
data.processed:
󠁿I had fallen on my butt and was pointing. 
󠁿The caterpillar was on the stem of a tomato.

data.text:
Ah, a Swallowtail caterpillar. 
I guess seeing one up close would be kind of shocking, huh~.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, a Swallowtail caterpillar. 
󠁿I guess seeing one up close would be kind of shocking, huh~.

data.text:
……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably 
keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but 
I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably 
󠁿keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but 
󠁿I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.

data.text:
……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably 
keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but 
I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿……Alright, if you stay here, you'll probably 
󠁿keep surprising this person, so, sorry, but 
󠁿I'm gonna have to move you somewhere else~.

data.text:
I've let it go, so it should be fine now! Seems like you 
fell on your butt, but you didn't hurt your hips did you?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I've let it go, so it should be fine now! Seems like you 
󠁿fell on your butt, but you didn't hurt your hips did you?

data.text:
I guess bugs are kinda scary if you're not used to them. 
……right, I'll take care of the harvesting then!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I guess bugs are kinda scary if you're not used to them. 
󠁿……right, I'll take care of the harvesting then!

data.text:
I feel bad making you do something you're not used to. 
I'll get this done quick, so just wait a bit.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿I feel bad making you do something you're not used to. 
󠁿I'll get this done quick, so just wait a bit.

data.text:
Tomatoes, cucumbers, and some corn too! 
I've already checked for insects so it should be ready to eat!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿Tomatoes, cucumbers, and some corn too! 
󠁿I've already checked for insects so it should be ready to eat!

data.text:
It's fine! Taking some of the veggies helps me out too. 
……Alright, it's about time we get to training!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
󠁿It's fine! Taking some of the veggies helps me out too. 
󠁿……Alright, it's about time we get to training!

data.text:
Saying that with a smile, Katsuragi Ace left the field. 
……But I could still tell that she felt a little lonely 
without her family.
data.processed:
󠁿Saying that with a smile, Katsuragi Ace left the field. 
󠁿……But I could still tell that she felt a little lonely 
󠁿without her family.

data.text:
What should I do to cheer up Katsuragi Ace? 
I stared at the vegetables I'd received while thinking about it.
data.processed:
󠁿What should I do to cheer up Katsuragi Ace? 
󠁿I stared at the vegetables I'd received while thinking about it.
